name: Void Coefficient
description:
Made within 3 days for the jamDNA 2

A space racing game where you have to pass through rings and not only race against time, butinstead race against your fastest times. So it gets even harder and more instense each game. The time to win is shown in the menu and the countdown begins in the game.
You can collect bright green spirit gems, which enlighten your spirit and increase your spirit meter.

With all of this, your aim is to complete the race the quickest. Some rings have buttons that you must shoot the Fire Balls in order to pass through, but since they are made in the nuclear reactor of your ship,shooting heats it up, so beaware of that and don't let your reactor explode.
You won't be damaged by the obstacles around you but they will slow you down.
There is a small aroow on the top of the ship to help you guide towards the next ring.

And remember, you'll not win unless you're better than the past.

CONTROLS:

Space                                       - Shoot Fire Ball

Right Mouse Button       - Spirit Speed Up

Left Mouse button          - Shoot Fire Ball

Escape                                    - Pause/UnPause

Mouse                                    - Look Around

All assets were made from scratch during the duration of the game jam.
